review.name: John Doe
review.comment: I liked it all very much. I will come here again with my family. Recommended!
review.altText: back rectangle plate that contains different type of sushi, presented on a table

review.name: MJ Diamond
review.comment: Absolutely the best sushi experience I've had! Fresh ingredients and beautiful presentation. Highly recommend!

review.name: Carlo V.
review.comment: Every dish was a work of art. The freshness and quality of the sushi is unbeatable!
review.altText: serving board containing numerous sushi of different kind.
